description: This is a FastAPI-based backend source file implementing CRUD operations for a notes application, including health check, create, read, update, delete, and list endpoints, with database interactions via SQLAlchemy.

classes.name: HealthResponse
classes.description: Pydantic model for health check response containing status, service name, and version.

methods.name: health_check
methods.description: Health check endpoint to verify that the service is running and return basic metadata.

methods.name: create_note
methods.description: Creates a new note with title and content, handling database insertion and error handling.

methods.name: list_notes
methods.description: Returns a paginated list of notes, supporting optional search query.

methods.name: get_note
methods.description: Retrieves a specific note by its ID.

methods.name: update_note
methods.description: Updates the title and/or content of an existing note.

methods.name: delete_note
methods.description: Deletes a note by its ID, returning 204 on success.

search-terms: create, list, get, update, delete notes
